title: The land owner shall be given first preference to implement scheme on his / her land
clause_text: The land owner shall be given first preference to implement scheme on his / her land. However landowner in same survey number or part of it having title of an area exceeding 50% shall be given the preference, if he / she is ready to pay an amount of compensation for remaining land. The amount of compensation to be offered shall be decided as per the provisions u/s 17 of the Slum Act.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
